creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: rust-colored fabric woven with narrower tan, olive, black, mustard and turquoise geometric band on one side, with smaller geometric bands flaking larger band; wider tan geometric band on opposite side, with smaller multicolored bands; red and white fringe
title: Shoulder cloth
